summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5527 for the improvement of 40th Avenue Southwest, from West Holly Street to West Graham Street; by constructing concrete sidewalks and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 70804, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
